title: MindTrack – Mood & Habit Journal
difficulty: ★★☆☆ – requires data cleaning, trend logic, and simple visualization.
goal: Let students log mood, sleep, and study habits, then visualize correlations between lifestyle and productivity.
why_it_matters: Many students burn out silently; daily reflection helps them notice patterns before stress escalates.
data: Mood (1–5 scale), hours slept, study duration, brief notes.
ai: Rolling average + z-score spike detection to highlight anomalies.
Keyword extraction (spaCy small) to tag recurring stressors.
workflow: Daily input form captures mood, hours, notes.
Normalization and plotting engine builds weekly graphs.
AI module detects mood dips or repeated stress words.
Insight cards explain trends in friendly language.
Student receives a reflection summary at week’s end.
outcome: Demonstrates applied analytics + lightweight NLP with clean UI storytelling.
